elements: My congregation's strength will nourish me.
When I am Threshold, this scar will open beneath a blade's touch.
When I am Threshold, this scar will open to the touch of hot iron.
When I am Threshold, this scar will open to a fervent kiss.
When I am Threshold, this scar will open at the beat of the drum.
When I am Threshold, this scar will open at the flush of dawn.
When I am Threshold, this scar will answer to the scissors.
When I am Threshold, this scar will open last.
